name: Forgor Owl & The Seven Lolis
description:
Life is happy and peaceful in the Bunkeronii kingdom, until one day Princess Mumei suddenly goes missing. What happened, and will she make it back home?

Made with UE5, so the engine might not want to play it on lower end machines.

Lowest specs tested on (and works fine):

OS: Windows 10, 64-bit

Processor: Intel i7-4720HQ

RAM: 8GB

Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960M

DirectX: 11

You can also watch a full playthrough on youtube:
